CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Polymer
2. Donor materials
3. Acceptor materials
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. Here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Polymer
2. Donor materials
3. Acceptor materials

The term "polymer" is a material name, and "donor materials" and "acceptor materials" are also material names, as they refer to specific types of materials used in the development of polymer solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer |
| Donor materials |
| Acceptor materials |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)
2. Donor materials
3. Acceptor materials
4. Device engineering
5. Fabrication processes

These are the entities in the paragraph that refer to properties or characteristics of polymer solar cells, rather than the cells themselves.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the paragraph:

1. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)
2. Donor materials
3. Acceptor materials

These three entities are the ones that directly relate to the properties of the materials used in polymer solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in the same words as in the original paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) |
| Donor materials |
| Acceptor materials |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. Power conversion efficiency (PCE) - This is a property of polymer solar cells (PSCs) and can be considered a "Property Value" entity.
2. 10% - This is a value of the power conversion efficiency (PCE) property, and can also be considered a "Property Value" entity.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* Power conversion efficiency (PCE)
* 10%
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here's the updated list of "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, with only the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

1. 10% - This is a value of the power conversion efficiency (PCE) property, which is a material property of polymer solar cells (PSCs).

So, the only "Property Value" entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to the value of a material property is:

* 10% (as a value of the power conversion efficiency property of PSCs)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the "Property Value" entity in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 10% |

The "10%" value refers to the power conversion efficiency (PCE) property of polymer solar cells (PSCs).
